text: Michael McCafferty may refer to: * Michael McCafferty (software entrepreneur) (born 1942), entrepreneur * Michael McCafferty, American actor in The Invisible Man (2000 TV series) Not a Father's Day *Michael McCafferty, British poet in Children of Albion: Poetry of the Underground in Britain *Michael McCafferty, American researcher of Illinois Indians and Des Moines River *Michael McCafferty, Northern Ireland musician of Swanee River (band) ==See also== ;Distinguish from * Michael Cafferty, British ambassador to Dominican Republic, see List of Ambassadors of the United Kingdom to the Dominican Republic McCafferty, Michael
title: Michael McCafferty (disambiguation)
